statements: SELECT * FROM training_progress
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50
SELECT id, student_name FROM training_progress ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage, learning_curve FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 70
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE student_name LIKE '%Alice%'
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 80;
SELECT id, student_name FROM training_progress ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE learning_curve->>'skills' LIKE '%Python%';
SELECT id, student_name, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_progress ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, training_duration FROM training_progress WHERE training_score > 90
SELECT user_id, training_score FROM training_progress WHERE training_duration >= 60
SELECT training_duration, training_date FROM training_progress WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT * FROM learning_curves ORDER BY curve_id ASC
SELECT * FROM training_progress ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, training_duration FROM training_progress WHERE training_score > 90;
SELECT training_date, AVG(training_duration) AS avg_duration FROM training_progress GROUP BY training_date ORDER BY avg_duration DESC;
SELECT t.user_id, l.curve_id, l.learning_curve_data FROM training_progress t JOIN learning_curves l ON t.user_id = l.user_id WHERE t.training_duration > 60;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM training_progress;
SELECT * FROM training_progress ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT subject, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 75;
SELECT * FROM learning_curves WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY curve_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM user_profiles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT subject, MAX(progress_percentage) AS max_progress FROM training_progress GROUP BY subject;
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 80 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT subject, AVG(progress_percentage) as average_progress FROM training_progress GROUP BY subject;
SELECT u.username, t.subject, t.training_date FROM user_profiles u INNER JOIN training_progress t ON u.user_id = t.id;
SELECT DISTINCT subject FROM learning_curves WHERE performance_score < 50;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) as total_users, MAX(progress_percentage) as max_progress FROM training_progress;
SELECT * FROM training_progress;
SELECT student_id, level, score FROM training_progress WHERE level > 5;
SELECT course_name, lecturer, start_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT progress_percentage FROM learning_curves WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, date_time, progress_report FROM progress_logs WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE level > 3 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_name, lecturer FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM learning_curves WHERE progress_percentage < 50;
SELECT * FROM progress_logs WHERE course_id = 1 AND date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, level, score FROM training_progress JOIN learning_curves ON training_progress.student_id = learning_curves.student_id;
SELECT * FROM training_progress;
SELECT user_id, training_date FROM training_progress ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, course_id FROM user_courses ORDER BY user_id ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 90;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_courses JOIN users ON user_courses.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT training_id, user_id, MAX(training_date) AS latest_training_date FROM training_progress GROUP BY user_id;
